data.name: WingMan
data.detailed_description:
WingMan is a point & click adventure game, where you will embark on a whirlwind adventure with Tbone as his wingman. As we all know, It’s about taking one for the team, regardless of the circumstances. You and Tbone will go to different nightclubs to dance and flirt with ladies. Every now and then you will be faced with decisions that will alter the path of your wingman adventure. Hitting on the wrong ladies can cause fights with random guys and bouncers.

The core objective is to get on as many nightclub guess lists as possible! As the game progresses you will gain prestige status (Wingman perk props! = WPP), which in turn will allow you to get into more and more nightclubs and learn new dance moves. A game map will open up showing clubs from all around the world that you can choose from. Tbone will rely on your conversational skills to win the moment. As well as discovering different dance moves using your mouse and click movement. This is going to be a lot of fun. I can't wait to see how you do YOU!

data.short_description: WingMan is a point & click adventure game, where you will embark on a whirlwind adventure with Tbone as his wingman. As we all know, It’s about taking one for the team, regardless of the circumstances. You and Tbone will go to different nightclubs to dance and flirt with ladies all around the world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2400 / AMD CPU
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 670 2GB / AMD Radeon R9 280 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit.
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-2600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390X or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: In this point & click adventure game, your main objective is hanging out with your wingman. The game focuses mostly on dancing with your mouse in a point-and-click fashion. There is no main adultness about the game other than you are hanging out and chasing girls. There is no nudity, no making out. It's really more about conversations with bouncers, girls, club owners & cops.
